title: December 19, 2024 — Snowflake Notebooks warehouse runtime on AWS PrivateLink and Azure Private Link — Preview | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: With this release, Snowflake Notebooks now supports AWS PrivateLink and Microsoft Azure Private Link.

Snowflake Notebooks is a development interface in Snowsight that offers an interactive, cell-based programming environment for Python and SQL. In Snowflake Notebooks, you can perform exploratory data analysis, develop machine learning models, and perform other data science and data engineering tasks all in one place.
For more information, see Private connectivity for Snowflake Notebooks.
